list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Prevent exception during db update if no movie data is available

task.summary: Add lineup.tv WebGrab config file with updated ids for current dictionary
Add ClaroTV and netcombo to configuration file
Add WebGrab config file for TVMap
Fix and additions to WebGrab config
Add movie metadada functionality and refactoring
Only save movies and series files when vod process enabled to prevent overwrite
Force usage of arguments for running main
Make switch to enable vod update obligatory
Fix for switch on vod update
Add net.com.br as provider and adapt dictionary
Fix movie detail functionality. Movie details were being appended to end of line but description should be part of M3U tag
Refactor - move tmdb related tasks out from M3uFixer
Add failed TMDB to need_fixes.m3u file instead to current one.
Bug - Remove unnecessary end of line during function run
Move adult movies to separate list and skip TMDB check
Handle HTTP error from movie database
Change movie description fields and format
Refactoring - move WebGrab configuration to separate folder
Write to DB only if record not present. Trying to improve performance by reading more than writing.
Add more informational logger for threads.
Add movie data automatic and manual fixer for not found data.
Add movie data automatic and manual fixer for not found data.
Write lines at once instead of line by line when generating list
